original_text: Three times I was beaten with rods, once I was pelted with stones, three times I was shipwrecked, I spent a night and a day in the open sea,
korean_text: 세 번 태장으로 맞고 한 번 돌로 맞고 세 번 파선하고 일 주야를 깊은 바다에서 지냈으며

sentences.original_text: Three times I was beaten with rods
once I was pelted with stones
I spent a night and a day in the open sea
